article: There are four people in my family. They are my parents, my sister and I. My father is forty years old. He is a Chinese teacher in a middle school. My mother is a teacher, too. But she is at another school. She is an English teacher. My sister's name is Li Fang. She is seven years old. She is a student. We are in different classes and grades. My sister is in Class Two, Grade One. But I am in Class One, Grade Seven. Look at the photo of my family on the desk. In this photo, my sister and I are in front of our parents. We all look happy.
questions: There is a photo of my family _ .
